commit message:
Implement Font Size choice

Added two options:

- An option to change the size of articles font

- An option to change the size of list items font

Implement custom feeds!

Implement custom feeds right-to-left drawer layout (please use RSS 2.0
feedburner format)

Thanks to a dynamic list, and a fab button which will autohide when list
is scrolling, it is possible now to add all the feeds You want. Feeds
will be stored inside an sqlite database and saved on memory.
Furthermore You can also delete them from the list

- Resources clean

simplify navigation drawer menu, remove some feeds

Just keep internation news feed and only some of them (the most
followed) since it is now possible to add feeds dynamically

use placeholder image instead of remove a view if setImage is empty

- Removing that if statement will fix NullPointerException with mixed
feeds (feeds containing items with null images and items with non-null
images)

- removed 'remove images' option which will cause NullPointerException
described above

fix another NullPointerException & clean

- remove useless if statement

- fix setDesc NullPointerException  (some items may not provide a
description, but only a title) by adding a non-null value

¯\\_(ツ)_/¯ shiz happens
Use percent layout for share and continue reading buttons

changes to custom feeds drawer

- Use a toolbar, instead of a fab button, containing add and remove
buttons

- Remove button will remove items starting from the last
add share  and continue reading buttons to toolbar

use custom adapter for custom feeds list

we use a custom adapter to set feeds titles and urls

article ui visual changes

- just changed things a bit (article text color, layout parameters etc)

- added a placeholder image if image is not parsed
change articles text size default value
